title: High School Tournament
body:
Greetings Summoners,
I have an exciting opportunity for League of Legends players currently attending High School to showcase your skills and make new friends while representing your school.

I am a year 12 student at Liverpool Boys High School trying to create something special during my last year of High School that will continue for years to come.

I am currently in the process of organising school league teams that can practice and compete together in a fun and engaging environment. I have support from individuals at Riot Games Oceania but we are looking for students in schools around NSW to show their interest. You can do this by getting a member of staff at your school to organise a team of students that wish to compete.

The events will be at pre determined locations (either at one of the schools or a gaming internet cafe) in which your team will have to travel to in the form of an excursion with the help of your staff organiser.

With your support we will also attempt to have League of Legends available to be played at High School's with access to the schools computers and Internet.

Once you have a team you can contact me through my department email with reference to the name of your school and a suitable method of contacting the member of staff organising the team.

This is a great opportunity to show schools around Australia how League of Legends can be a big part of students' education and create lasting friendships with others.

Please contact me about your interest.

Email:
simo.jurisic@education.nsw.gov.au

Thanks.

replies.body: Such a cool initiative - get on board this!
